alert.note: Alert for Benewah (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 5:09PM MDT until June 16 at 10:51AM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Idaho... Washington... St Joe River at St Maries affecting Benewah County. Pend Oreille River below Albeni Falls affecting Pend Oreille and Bonner Counties. For the St. Joe River...including St Maries...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Joe River at St Maries. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding throughout the low lying areas of the St Joe Valley. Outbuildings along the river that are not behind the levee may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM PDT Wednesday the stage was 32.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 32.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM PDT.
